<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Seminar - APAC 2017 in Melbourne. Please save this email for future reference. Event: Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Seminar - APAC 2017 Location: PARKROYAL Melbourne Airport Arrival Drive, Melbourne Airport VIC 3045, Australia Date: Tuesday, Oct. 3
We look forward to meeting you!
Sincerely, Rick WongSales Manager – Pacific | BGA Honeywell | AerospaceMobile: +61 481 902751Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com]]>
